introduction: “WHY CAN’T WE GET ALONG” (2018) - a rag & bone films productionThom Yorke has contributed new music to a new short film from fashion label rag & bone.Credits卡司如下：Co-Directors: Benjamin Millepied, Aaron Duffy and Bob PartingtonDirector of Photography: Darius KhondjiChoreography: Benjamin MillepiedMusic: Thom Yorke（大写加粗哈哈）Lead CastKate Mara（凯特妹纸！）Ansel Elgort（B~A～B～Y～可爱baby 君from Baby Driver极盗车神！）Supporting CastShane "Sage" SamuelsDonielle "D Bigga Swindles" CheathamKareem "Reaper" SmallAlexandre HammoudiApril GiangerusoBetsy McBrideBreanne GranlundElina MiettinenPatrick FrenetteNia ParkerCamryn TaylorKandi ReignExecutive Producer: Marcus WainwrightExecutive Creative Producer: Marissa KraxbergerProducers: Candice Hernstad, Garrett Fennelly and Taryn NagleEditor: Will Towne at Modern PostColor: Tim Masick at Co3Music Director: Kris Bones1st Assistant Director: Brennan Brooks2nd Assistant Director: Antonio DunstonConcept: Aaron DuffyCreative Partner: SpecialGuest (Aaron Duffy, Cedric Gairard, Tazri Afrin, Eddy Choi, Lauren Moroz, and Danielle Duclos)Rig Master: Tony HillProduction company: 1stAveMachineShot on location at Greenpoint Terminal, Brooklyn NYSpecial Thanks to:Peter Hess at CAAKatie Krell Slater at WMEThomas Marquardt at ICMChristopher D.
